title: Google Cloud Observability - 導出器配置簡介
abstract:
# Google Cloud Observability - 導出器配置簡介
您可以將導出器與 Google Cloud Managed Service for Prometheus 結合使用，以從第三方應用或 Prometheus 基礎架構的其他組件注入指標。
這組文檔包含許多常見導出器的配置說明。這些說明僅在您將 [代管式收集功能](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/setup-managed?hl=zh-cn) 與 Managed Service for Prometheus 搭配使用時適用。如果您使用的是自行部署的收集功能，請參閱相關導出器文檔，以瞭解在何處查找導出器的源代碼庫。
本文檔並非 Managed Service for Prometheus 支持的導出器詳盡列表。您可以配置代管式收集功能以爬取您可以設置的任何導出器。以下列表介紹了一些最常用的導出器。
content:
## 應用導出器
您可以將應用導出器與 Managed Service for Prometheus 搭配使用，從第三方應用收集指標。這些導出器通常設置爲獨立工作負載或現有 GKE 部署的 Sidecar。
有關詳情，請參閱以下文檔：
- [Aerospike](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/aerospike?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache ActiveMQ](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/activemq?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache Airflow](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/airflow?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache CouchDB](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/couchdb?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache Flink](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/flink?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache Hadoop](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/hadoop?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache HBase](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/hbase?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache Kafka](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/kafka?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache Solr](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/solr?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache Tomcat](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/tomcat?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache Web Server (httpd)](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/apache?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Apache Zookeeper](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/zookeeper?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Argo 工作流](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/argo-workflows?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Elasticsearch](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/elasticsearch?hl=zh-cn) 
- [etcd](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/etcd?hl=zh-cn) 
- [HAProxy](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/haproxy?hl=zh-cn) 
- [HashiCorp Consul](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/consul?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Ingress NGINX 控制器](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/ingress-nginx?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Jenkins](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/jenkins?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Jetty](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/jetty?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Kibana](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/kibana?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Memcached](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/memcached?hl=zh-cn) 
- [MongoDB](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/mongodb?hl=zh-cn) 
- [MySQL](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/mysql?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Nginx](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/nginx?hl=zh-cn) 
- [PostgreSQL](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/postgresql?hl=zh-cn) 
- [RabbitMQ](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/rabbitmq?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Redis](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/redis?hl=zh-cn) 
- [ScyllaDB](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/scylladb?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Varnish](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/varnish?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Velero](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/velero?hl=zh-cn) ## 基礎架構導出器
本部分中的文檔包含可用於安裝和爬取基礎架構 [導出器](https://prometheus.io/docs/instrumenting/exporters/) 的示例 YAML 清單和其他配置。例如，如需複製使用 [kube-prometheus 倉庫](https://github.com/prometheus-operator/kube-prometheus) 的體驗，您可以設置 [Kube State Metrics](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/kube_state_metrics?hl=zh-cn) 和 [Node Exporter](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/node_exporter?hl=zh-cn) 導出器，並配置託管式收集功能以爬取 [cAdvisor/Kubelet](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/kubelet-cadvisor?hl=zh-cn) 指標。
有關詳情，請參閱以下文檔：
- [GKE 控制平面指標](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/solutions/gke/managing-metrics?hl=zh-cn#control-plane-metrics) 
- [Hubble (GKE Dataplane V2)](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/concepts/about-dpv2-observability?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Istio](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/istio?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Kube State Metrics](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/kube_state_metrics?hl=zh-cn) 
- [cAdvisor/Kubelet](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/kubelet-cadvisor?hl=zh-cn) 
- [節點導出器](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/node_exporter?hl=zh-cn) 
- [NVIDIA 數據中心 GPU 管理器 (DCGM)](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/nvidia-dcgm?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Prometheus（自行監控）](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/docs/managed-prometheus/exporters/prometheus?hl=zh-cn)
